title: Leavebuster is BS
body: Why is it, that since like 2 updates ago, every like 10th game I play, I can't get to the loading screen because it tells me my internet isnt working. Then, i get 20 minute timers to play a game, even though it's riot that is causing me to miss games, not me leaving. Please fix this shit.

replies.body:
Riot isn't necessarily causing you to miss games, but if your network loses its connection during the loading screen there's a preeeeetty good chance that you'll get disconnected from our servers as well. You mentioned this wasn't happening awhile ago and isn't happening in every game so that tells me something must have changed or those random d/c's are just that, coincidence.

Just to be safe, make sure you run through our [**network settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is still in order there, but pay extra attention to port forwarding and how to flush your DNS.
and while it's telling me I have no internet connection, I can log on here and complain about it
